## What is inheritance?

Inheritance is an important principle of object-oriented programming. With inheritance, a **subclass** (also called a *child class*) can inherit the attributes and behaviors of a **superclass** (also called a *parent class*).

## How do I create a subclass?

Use the `extends`(#e7e8ea) keyword to indicate that the class is a subclass and the superclass it inherits from.

```
public class NameOfSubclass extends NameOfSuperclass {

}
```

Be sure to replace `NameOfSubclass`(#e7e8ea) with the name of the class you are creating as the subclass and `NameOfSuperclass`(#e7e8ea) with the name of the superclass this class should inherit from.

## What is the Object class?

The `Object`(#e7e8ea) class is the superclass of all other classes.
